body_content.explanation: unusual and strange, sometimes in an unpleasant way:
examples: She has the most peculiar ideas.
It's peculiar that they didn't tell us they were going away.
The video on road accidents made me feel rather peculiar (= ill).

body_content.explanation: belonging to, relating to, or found in only particular people or things:
examples: He gets on with things in his own peculiar way/manner/fashion.
They noted that special manner of walking that was peculiar to her alone.
This type of building is peculiar to the south of the country.
